00092 typedef struct __orxSYSTEM_EVENT_PAYLOAD_t
00093 {
00094   union
00095   {
00096     orxU32      u32FrameCounter;
00097 
00098     /* Touch event */
00099     struct
00100     {
00101       orxDOUBLE dTime;
00102       orxU32    u32ID;
00103       orxFLOAT  fX, fY, fPressure;
00104     } stTouch;
00105 
00106     /* Accelerometer event */
00107     struct
00108     {
00109       orxDOUBLE dTime;
00110       orxVECTOR vAcceleration;
00111     } stAccelerometer;
00112   };
00113 
00114 } orxSYSTEM_EVENT_PAYLOAD;
